engineering_review.template: You are an expert engineer reviewing: {input}. Focus on {criteria}. Consider the following aspects: technical feasibility, scalability, maintainability, and security implications.

system_design.description: Template for system architecture and design decisions
system_design.template: As a system architect, analyze the following requirements: {requirements}. Provide a detailed system design considering: {constraints}. Include recommendations for architecture patterns, technology stack, and scalability considerations.

decision_analysis.description: Template for analyzing complex business or technical decisions
decision_analysis.template: Analyze the following decision scenario: {scenario}. Consider the stakeholders: {stakeholders}. Evaluate the options: {options}. Provide a structured analysis including pros, cons, risks, and recommendations based on the criteria: {criteria}.

disaster_response.description: Template for disaster response planning and analysis
disaster_response.template: As a disaster response coordinator, analyze the following scenario: {scenario}. Consider the requirements from the disaster response documentation and provide a comprehensive response plan addressing: {focus_areas}. Include resource allocation, timeline, and risk mitigation strategies.
